 import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { CartService } from 'src/app/service/cart.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-cart', templateUrl: './cart.component.html', styleUrls: ['./cart.component.css'] }) export class CartComponent implements OnInit { public products:any = [] public grandTotal!:number constructor(private cartService:CartService){} ngOnInit(): void { this.cartService.getProducts().subscribe(res => { this.products = res; this.grandTotal = this.cartService.getTotalPrice() }) } }
